# ChessHelper Project Instructions

This is a frontend chess analysis tool project built for 仙奕破阵 assistance, using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

## Project Structure
- `index.html` - Main game page
- `styles/` - CSS stylesheets
- `scripts/` - JavaScript game logic
- `assets/` - Images and other assets

## Development Guidelines
- Use semantic HTML for accessibility
- Implement responsive CSS design
- Write clean, modular JavaScript
- Follow chess game rules and logic
- Ensure cross-browser compatibility

## Features to Implement
- Interactive chessboard
- Piece movement validation
- Turn-based gameplay
- Check/checkmate detection
- Game state management
